diagram:
@startuml
[*] --> Available
state "Checked Out" as CheckedOut
state "Reserved" as Reserved
state "Lost" as Lost
Available --> CheckedOut : borrow
CheckedOut --> Available : return
CheckedOut --> Reserved : requestReserve
Available --> Reserved : reserve
Reserved --> Available : cancelReserve
CheckedOut --> Lost : reportLost
Lost --> [*] : remove
@enduml
raw_diagram:
@startuml
[*] --> Available
state "Checked Out" as CheckedOut
state "Reserved" as Reserved
state "Lost" as Lost
Available --> CheckedOut : borrow
CheckedOut --> Available : return
CheckedOut --> Reserved : requestReserve
Available --> Reserved : reserve
Reserved --> Available : cancelReserve
CheckedOut --> Lost : reportLost
Lost --> [*] : remove
@enduml
